original_text:
See if there is any offensive way in me,
    and lead me in the way everlasting.
korean_text: 내게 무슨 악한 행위가 있나 보시고 나를 영원한 길로 인도하소서

sentences.original_text: See if there is any offensive way in me
sentences.korean_translation: 나에게 어떤 악한 길이 있는지 살펴보시고

sentences.original_text: and lead me in the way everlasting
